original_title: Democrat Graham Platner enters 2026 race against Sen. Susan Collins | Fox News
article_summary: "Combat veteran and oyster farm owner Graham Platner, a Democratic challenger, has announced his campaign against Sen. Susan Collins (R-ME) in 2026. Platner, a self-proclaimed 'foe of the oligarchy,' is criticized by Maine Republicans as a 'far-left progressive' and faces opposition from rural conservative voters."</s>
